title: Change default formatting settings to break lines at 120 characters
description: Our eclipse settings default to break lines at 80 characters. This issue changes them to break lines at 120 characters.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Hmmm, we should probably make the IntelliJ and Netbeans styles do the same.

comments.author: Uwe Schindler
comments.content: +1 (I personally would like to disable this completely)

comments.author: Shai Erera
comments.content:
Thanks Erick Erickson, I didn't find a file under dev-tools/idea which specifies anything like that, but I changed the only netbeans file which mentioned something like that. Hope it's it .

Anyway, can always handle that in a separate commit, though if anyone can point me to the file under idea/ which defines that, I will gladly change it too.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Shai Erera Hmmm, now I understand why this didn't really seem like a problem to me. I use IntelliJ and apparently word wrapping is turned off already. Ya' learn something new every day....
